/* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/alt-text */ /* eslint-disable react/no-unescaped-entities */ import React from 'react'; import { StackedCard, Button } from 'reactify'; import './stacked-card.scss'; import { borderedColoredCode, customClassCode, customSizeCode, disabledCode, noShadowCode, simpleCode, } from './code-refrence'; import DemoCard from '../../components/demo-card'; const StackedCardDemo = () => (

StackedCard.Body, StackedCard.Header and StackedCard.Footer's children should be able to have their own width such as (width: 300px) or are block elements.

Adrift in space with no food or water, Tony Stark sends a message to Pepper Potts as his oxygen supply starts to dwindle.

); export default StackedCardDemo;
